mapper.sql: id, x, y, xy, name, address, province, joinindex, program, date,tel
mapper.insert: insert into t_map ( x, y, name, address, province, joinindex, program, tel,date) values ( #{map.x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.joinindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{map.program,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{map.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{map.date,jdbcType=DATE})

id,

mapper.update:
update t_map
x = #{map.x,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
y = #{map.y,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{map.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{map.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{map.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
joinindex = #{map.joinindex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
program = #{map.program,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date = #{map.date,jdbcType=DATE},
where id = #{map.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_map set x = #{map.x,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, y = #{map.y,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{map.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{map.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{map.province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, joinindex = #{map.joinindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, program = #{map.program,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{map.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{map.date,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{map.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select distinct t.program id , t.program text from t_map t
select distinct t.province id , t.province text from t_map t
select distinct t.province id , t.province text from t_province t
